Font driver reference¶

class fcb._font.Font(width, height, pixel)[source]¶

A class for writing text onto the display framebuffer. The font is a fixed 5x8 font.

draw_char(ch, x, y, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Draws a single character at the specified location

Parameters:
  • ch – The character to draw
  • x – X location to draw at
  • y – Y location to draw at
Additional arguments:
 

Passed to the pixel drawing function of the framebuffer, for example to set the colour
text(text, x, y, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Draws text with the top-left corner of the text at the specified location

Parameters:
  • text – The text to draw
  • x – X location to draw at
  • y – Y location to draw at
Additional arguments:
 

Passed to the pixel drawing function of the framebuffer, for example to set the colour
width(text)[source]¶

Calculates the width of a run of text

Parameters:text – The text to calculate the width for
Returns:The width of the run of text in pixels
